normalised: Good news for all you Sharmajis and Vermas looking to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) has announced an extension of the rooftop solar subsidy program till March thirty first, two thousand and twenty six. That's right, more time to get those panels installed and save some serious rupees on your electricity bills!

unnormalised: Good news for all you Sharmajis and Vermas looking to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) has announced an extension of the rooftop solar subsidy program till March 31, 2026. That's right, more time to get those panels installed and save some serious Rs. on your electricity bills!
normalised: Under the scheme, homeowners can still snag subsidies for installing rooftop solar panels. Think of finally being able to run your A C without guilt during Delhi's scorching summers! The subsidy amount varies depending on the capacity of the system, but it can significantly reduce your upfront costs.

unnormalised: Under the scheme, homeowners can still snag subsidies for installing rooftop solar panels. Think of finally being able to run your AC without guilt during Delhi's scorching summers! The subsidy amount varies depending on the capacity of the system, but it can significantly reduce your upfront costs.
normalised: "This extension is a big boost for the 'Make in India' initiative and will encourage more people in places like Lucknow and Jaipur to adopt solar," said Doctor Arun Mehta, a leading energy expert. The subsidy covers systems up to ten kilowatts, perfect for most homes around one thousand five hundred square feet. So, ditch those pesky power cuts and embrace the sun, folks! Don't delay, avail it before the sun sets on this offer! Contact your nearest empanelled vendor for more details on how to apply.

unnormalised: "This extension is a big boost for the 'Make in India' initiative and will encourage more people in places like Lucknow and Jaipur to adopt solar," said Dr. Arun Mehta, a leading energy expert. The subsidy covers systems up to 10 kW, perfect for most homes around 1500 sq ft. So, ditch those pesky power cuts and embrace the sun, folks! Don't delay, avail it before the sun sets on this offer! Contact your nearest empanelled vendor for more details on how to apply.
